Name: Shikhondo(食魂徒) - Soul Eater
About the game: 食魂徒 - Soul Eater The Soul Eater is shoot'em up game. Select one of the Grim Reaper or girl. Find escaped yokai from limbo, extricate soul that they absorbed. You must reseal them after Features Oriental background and unique stage boss Make higher scores, you need to stay close to the enemy bullet hell and start Soul collect mode We will provide the three game modues.
